BIO

I started to teach myself how to code in 2018. That was also the moment I decided that I want a career in software development. I learned a lot about web development and programming by myself, but then I enrolled in a coding bootcamp in 2019. and learned more than ever in my life. I learned all the basics concepts in procedural and object oriented programming in C++. I finished that bootcamp with a team project.
